dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1400 IS: Veterans Small Business Enhancement Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Durbin introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to direct the task force of the Office of Veterans Business Development to provide access to and manage the distribution of excess or surplus property to veteran-owned small businesses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Small Business Enhancement Act of 2015.

section.header: Access to excess or surplus property for veteran-owned small businesses
section.text: Section 32(c)(3)(B) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 657b(c)(3)(B)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (v), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in clause (vi), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: providing access to and managing the distribution of excess or surplus property owned by the United States to small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans, pursuant to a memorandum of understanding between the task force and the head of the applicable state agency (as defined in section 549 of title 40, United States Code).
